Barbara Corcoran: one of the Shark Tank judges, confirmed that the keto diet pill ads were fictitious and that none of the Sharks endorse keto. She also mentioned that the attorneys for Shark Tank have been actively pursuing the advertisers, but they constantly change their URLs and identities.
A search of Facebook: s Ad Library revealed that several ads, including some for One Shot Keto, were taken down for not carrying a required disclaimer label.
